entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
